text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: It's a crazy lineup, huh!? I was just my usual wicked self and the word spread like wildfire☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oguri-paisen, Ban-chamu, Yae-mero…… Kuuuu～ it really gets you fired up!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Anyway, it means this race is gonna be extra spicy! Uhyaa, I'm pysched～☆ Crazy～☆
Daitaku Helios hadn't even debuted yet. No matter how much hidden talent she had, against experienced opponents like this……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Don't be such a downer～. 'Sides, looky there!

text_block_list.name: Friend A
text_block_list.text: Uwa, seriously!? Helios-chan's runnin' in a mock race that looks like a G1. So the group LANE wasn't lying……

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Really, I have no idea what that girl's thinking…… But, an opportunity like this doesn't come around often. I need to properly analyze it!

text_block_list.name: Friend B
text_block_list.text: Helios～～～～!! You're our Blitz Captain～～!! You better not lose to them when it comes to guts～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oh yeah! Just watch me～☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: See? They're all chompin' at the bit too! Got no choice but to take the reins!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: 'Sides, results? ―We won't know 'til it's over!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Well, just sit back and relax～! Heli-poyo is gonna knock this Wei～ outta the park☆ Let's go!
If she's like that in front of this line up, then just maybe…… that means she was confident enough that she purposefully gathered them!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ―Hell yeah, pedal to the metal～～～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Ooooooh……!? Daitaku Helios leapt out in front! And she just keeps on accelerating……!
Daitaku Helios was running at a speed that seemed like she wasn't even thinking about pacing herself, she just continued to pull further ahead. And that's not all――

text_block_list.name: Friend B
text_block_list.text: Gyahahaa, keep it up Helios!! Red-line it～～～～!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: You got it～～!! You better kick it up over there too～～～～!! Ahahaa!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: She's got enough leeway…… to hold a conversation!? That girl, don't tell me…… she's seriously planning to run away with this? Against those opponents……!?

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaaaah～……
In the end, she couldn't recover from that……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Zeeeeh…… Haaa…… Ugh, gonna puke…… And I was last～…… Haa～～…… Seriously, seriously―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ―Seriously, that was hilarious!! Wahahaha～!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I really wanted to push through to the end though～. Knew it, I just didn't have the stamina! Fuha☆
choice_data_list: You had no chance from the start!?
You had no chance from the start!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yeah, there was no way! But, I had a blast!♪ I just love racing～! Good work, me! Good work everyone～!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Haa, I was worried there. Daitaku Helios…… Fufuu, what an interesting girl. But, well…… teaming up with her…… is a bit much.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Talking to the spectators during the race…… it's almost like she has no ability to focus. A girl that only wants to perform, I wouldn't want to face her……

text_block_list.name: Friend B
text_block_list.text: Helios, you really are insane～! You gotta do something fun like this again. Haven't you been offline kind of often lately?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I have～!! We should fix that! LANE me!! See ya～☆
She had just come in last, but I didn't sense any sense of frustration from Daitaku Helios at all. Of course, she was probably down about it, but……
choice_data_list: Um, aren't you…… a little upset?
Um, aren't you…… a little upset?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa, about that～! Nope, not one bit☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Well, it would have been awesome if I won! Losing isn't gonna pull me down, though. No regrets!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I mean, it was super fun, right!? Everyone was all smiles! And I was～ awesome! Ain't nothing to be down about～, right!?
It wasn't a front at all, she, from the bottom of her heart…… was laughing. I never thought I'd meet a student here that was so outside the norm.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's up with your palm!? Isn't it really red?
When I looked, my fingernails had left marks in my palm. "She might win!" ……when I had been thinking that, I must have unintentionally clenched my fists.
choice_data_list: (Right, I was excited for her. But……)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ……Ah, I just remembered something! We were talking about contracts, right? What do you want to do―

text_block_list.name: Friend C
text_block_list.text: Yo, Heli～! We're heading to a family restaurant with Jordan, wanna come～?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I'll go――!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hnya?
I had gotten to see her run but, I still didn't have a clear understanding of her. At the very least, I wanted to hear what she wanted to focus on―
choice_data_list: Do you have a dream you want to fulfill?
Do you have a dream you want to fulfill?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: A never-ending festival! Byeeee～☆
―Her run was very promising. She could probably make big things happen, that's what I felt. But……
There was no good or bad when it came to dreams. But if I was going to be her trainer, I wanted her to be able to aim for it seriously.
A clash of serious emotions was what made races awe-inspiring. With the way she is now, I couldn't sense any sense of "seriousness" in her……
choice_data_list: (I need to know more about her)

text_block_list.text: And so, on the next day off. I went in to the city to find Daitaku Helios…… I found her almost immediately, and she seemed to be in a good mood.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oh! You came at just the right time! You free? Wanna dance!?
